Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & 35th Term.; WB: Exit via 35th Term., due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 31st/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & into 35th Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate/Exit via 35th Terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Line trains are running with delays due to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
